CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is because it directly uses the 'PMA_commonParams.get('table')' in the HTML content without properly sanitizing it. If the 'table' parameter contains malicious script, it will be executed in the user's browser.
